text: [A] When this is Reversed in Battle, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 Climax from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room. If you added a card to your hand, choose a card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.

[A] When this attacks, if you have another ::Poppin' Party:: Character, for the turn this gains +3000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO [Reveal an '"Astral Harmony" Arisa Ichigaya' in your hand, place it to Stock, and put an "MV Production Days" from your Climax Zone into your Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, put up to 1 card from the top of your Library to Stock, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 2 ::Poppin' Party:: Characters from among them, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Place an '"Astral Harmony" Rimi Ushigome' from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "Very Satisfied" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, Deal 1 Damage to your Opponent twice. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] [Return this to hand] When your Climax card is placed in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Music:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other ::Poppin' Party:: Characters, Rest it and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[A] [(1)] When a Climax is placed to your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, put the top 2 cards from the top of your Library in the Waiting Room, choose a Level X or lower ::Poppin' Party:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand. X = the total of the Levels of the cards moved to Waiting Room by this effect. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)

[A] CX COMBO [Put a "Love Love" from your Climax Zone to the Waiting Room] During your Climax Phase, when this is placed to the Stage via the effect of "Love Love", you may pay cost. If so, Stand this.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] ENCORE [(1) Put a Character from the Stage to the Waiting Room]

[C] If this is in the Front Row, all your ::Poppin' Party:: Characters gain +1500 Power.
[A] [(2) Discard a '"Breakthrough!" Kasumi Toyama' from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, placed the top card of your Library into the Waiting Room, and Deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the Level of that +1. (Climax cards are considered Level 0. Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] Your other Front Row Center Slot Character that is Level 3 or higher gains +1000 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Poppin' Party:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [(1)] When this Front Attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and that Character gets -1 Level for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or when this is Reversed in Battler, look at the top card of your Library and place it on top of your Library or put it in your Waiting Room.
[S] [Place a ::Poppin' Party:: Character from hand to Clock, Rest this] Draw 2 cards.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and for the turn it gains the following ability. "[C] This card cannot be returned to hand or sent to Memory."
[A] When this attacks, if you have 5 or less Stock, for the turn this gains +3000 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] [(1)] When this Front Attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, and that Character gets -1 Level for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 1 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, your Opponent chooses a number between 0, 1, 2, and 3. Reveal the top card of your Library, and if it's a Character card with the same Level as the number chosen by the Opponent, put it in any Slot on the Stage. (Otherwise put it back where it was)

[C] For each of your other ::Poppin' Party:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, and put them back on top of your Library in any order.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, look at the top card of your Library and place it on top of your Library or your Waiting Room.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[S] [Rest this] Reveal the top card of your Library. If that card is Level 1 or higher place it in your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0. Otherwise put it back)

[A] [Discard a ::Poppin' Party:: Character from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters, send it to Memory, and at the beginning of the Encore Step, your Opponent may place that Character from Memory to any spot on their Stage.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may Reverse that Character.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, perform the [Standby Icon] effect.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, perform the [Standby Icon] effect.

[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest 2 of your Characters] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card with a Gate Trigger Icon revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] During this card's Battle, if Damage you are dealt is cancelled, you may return this to your hand.

[A] [(1)] When this is played from hand or Library to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 '"Rausch und/and Craziness II" Lisa Imai', place it to any Slot on the Stage, and shuffle your Library.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this card attacks, if "Getting Excited" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, place them on top of your Library in any order, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the number of your '"Rausch und/and Craziness II" Lisa Imai'. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] If you have another '"Rausch und/and Craziness II" Ako Udagawa'', all your other ::Roselia:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.

[A] When your Climax with a Book Trigger Icon is placed to your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Opponent's Front Row Characters, and for the turn that Character gets -1000 Power.
[S] RESONANCE [(1) Reveal a '"Rausch und/and Craziness II" Sayo Hikawa'' from your hand to your Opponent, Rest this] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Roselia:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] CX COMBO [Discard a '"Einheit" Rinko Shirokane' from hand to the Waiting Room, put a "Night at the Band Training Camp" from your Climax Zone to the Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Encore Step, of this is in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 5 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 5 ::Roselia:: Characters from among them, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.
[C] For each of your other Back Row ::Roselia:: Characters, this gains +2500 Power.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Roselia:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you use an [S] ability, all your Characters gain +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] [Discard 2 ::Roselia:: Characters from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, place them on top of your Library in any order, put all of your Opponent's Stock into their Waiting Room, and then put the same number of cards from the top of their Library to their Stock.
[A] During your Opponent's turn, when Damage taken by you isn't Cancelled, if this is in the Front Row, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Over the Future LIVE" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Roselia:: Character, place the top 20 cards of your Opponent's Library into their Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or more other ::Roselia:: Characters, you may draw a card. If so, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Roselia:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or less cards in Memory, you may choose a "Ako Udagawa, For the Live" in your Waiting Room and send it to Memory.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Roselia:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Roselia:: Characters.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Roselia:: Character, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this attacks, if the Character Opposite this is Level 2, for the turn this gains +6000 Power.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character on the bottom of the Library.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] [(2) Put a Character from your Stage in the Waiting Room] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters whose Level is higher than your Opponent and put it in the Waiting Room.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Discard a ::Roselia:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] Put the top card of your Library into the Waiting Room. If that card is a ::Roselia:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +X Power. X equals the Power of the Character placed in the Waiting Room by this effect.

[C] All ::Roselia:: Characters in your hand gain "[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1500, Level 2 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] This ability activates up to 3 times per turn. When you use BACKUP, you gain an additional Counter Step after this step.

[C] For each of your other "Ako Udagawa, For the Live" in the Front Row, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, Send this to Memory.
[A] CX COMBO RECOLLECTION When "Everyone at the Pool" is placed to your Climax Zone, if you are Level 2 or higher and this card is in Memory, you may place this card to any empty Slot on your Stage.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.
[A] [Return 2 ::Roselia:: Characters from your Waiting Room to your Library, shuffle your Library] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your ::Roselia:: Characters, and for the turn, they gain the following ability. "[C] This may Side Attack without Soul Penalty."

[C] All ::Roselia:: Characters in your hand gain "[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]".
[S] [(1) Rest this] Look at the top 2 cards of your Library, choose up to 1 Level 1 or higher card from them, reveal it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the rest in your Waiting Room. (Climax Cards are considered Level 0)
[A] This ability activates up to twice per turn. When you use an [S] ability, this gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
